author: Not available
source: The Complete Corpus of Anglo-Saxon Poetry

text.0: Frige mec frodum wordum!      Ne læt þinne ferð onhælne,
text.1: degol þæt þu deopost cunne!      Nelle ic þe min dyrne gesecgan,
text.2: gif þu me þinne hygecræft hylest      ond þine heortan geþohtas.
text.3: Gleawe men sceolon gieddum wrixlan.      God sceal mon ærest hergan
text.4: fægre, fæder userne,      forþon þe he us æt frymþe geteode
text.5: lif ond lænne willan;      he usic wile þara leana gemonian.
text.6: Meotud sceal in wuldre,      mon sceal on eorþan
text.7: geong ealdian.      God us ece biþ,
text.8: ne wendað hine wyrda      ne hine wiht dreceþ,
text.10: ne gomelað he in gæste,      ac he is gen swa he wæs,
text.11: þeoden geþyldig.      He us geþonc syleð,
text.17: þeoda ond þeawa.      þing sceal gehegan
text.18: frod wiþ frodne;      biþ hyra ferð gelic,
text.19: hi a sace semaþ,      sibbe gelærað,
text.21: Ræd sceal mid snyttro,      ryht mid wisum,
text.22: til sceal mid tilum.      Tu beoð gemæccan;
text.23: sceal wif ond wer      in woruld cennan
text.24: bearn mid gebyrdum.      Beam sceal on eorðan
text.27: ond dogra gehwam      ymb gedal sacan
text.29: hwær se cwealm cymeþ,      þe heonan of cyþþe gewiteþ.
text.31: þy weorþeð on foldan swa fela      fira cynnes,
text.32: ne sy þæs magutimbres      gemet ofer eorþan,
text.33: gif hi ne wanige      se þas woruld teode.
text.34: Dol biþ se þe his dryhten nat,      to þæs oft cymeð deað unþinged.
text.35: Snotre men sawlum beorgað,      healdað hyra soð mid ryhte.
text.36: Eadig bið se þe in his eþle geþihð,      earm se him his frynd geswicað.
text.37: Nefre sceal se him his nest aspringeð,      nyde sceal þrage gebunden.
text.38: Bliþe sceal bealoleas heorte.      Blind sceal his eagna þolian,
text.39: oftigen biþ him torhtre gesihþe.      Ne magon hi tunglu bewitian,
text.40: swegltorht sunnan ne monan;      þæt him biþ sar in his mode,
text.41: onge þonne he hit ana wat,      ne weneð þæt him þæs edhwyrft cyme.
text.42: Waldend him þæt wite teode,      se him mæg wyrpe syllan,
text.43: hælo of heofodgimme,      gif he wat heortan clæne.
text.44: Lef mon læces behofað.      Læran sceal mon geongne monnan,
text.45: trymman ond tyhtan þæt he teala cunne,      oþþæt hine mon atemedne hæbbe,
text.46: sylle him wist ond wædo,      oþþæt hine mon on gewitte alæde.
text.47: Ne sceal hine mon cildgeongne forcweþan,      ær he hine acyþan mote;
text.48: þy sceal on þeode geþeon,      þæt he wese þristhycgende.
text.49: Styran sceal mon strongum mode.      Storm oft holm gebringeþ,
text.50: geofen in grimmum sælum;      onginnað grome fundian
text.51: fealwe on feorran to londe,      hwæþer he fæste stonde.
text.52: Weallas him wiþre healdað,      him biþ wind gemæne.
text.55: swa beoþ þeoda geþwære,      þonne hy geþingad habbað,
text.56: gesittað him on gesundum þingum,      ond þonne mid gesiþum healdaþ
text.57: cene men gecynde rice.      Cyning biþ anwealdes georn;
text.58: lað se þe londes monað,      leof se þe mare beodeð.
text.59: þrym sceal mid wlenco,      þriste mid cenum,
text.61: Eorl sceal on eos boge,      eorod sceal getrume ridan,
text.62: fæste feþa stondan.      Fæmne æt hyre bordan geriseð;
text.63: widgongel wif word gespringeð,      oft hy mon wommum bilihð,
text.64: hæleð hy hospe mænað,      oft hyre hleor abreoþeð.
text.65: Sceomiande man sceal in sceade hweorfan,      scir in leohte geriseð.
text.66: Hond sceal heofod inwyrcan,      hord in streonum bidan,
text.67: gifstol gegierwed stondan,      hwonne hine guman gedælen.
text.68: Gifre biþ se þam golde onfehð,      guma þæs on heahsetle geneah;
text.69: lean sceal, gif we leogan nellað,      þam þe us þas lisse geteode.
text.70: Forst sceal freosan,      fyr wudu meltan,
text.75: winter sceal geweorpan,      weder eft cuman,
text.77: Deop deada wæg      dyrne bið lengest;
text.80: Cyning sceal mid ceape      cwene gebicgan,
text.81: bunum ond beagum;      bu sceolon ærest
text.82: geofum god wesan.      Guð sceal in eorle,
text.90: ricene geræcan,      ond him ræd witan
text.95: biþ his ceol cumen      ond hyre ceorl to ham,
text.96: agen ætgeofa,      ond heo hine in laðaþ,
text.97: wæsceð his warig hrægl      ond him syleþ wæde niwe,
text.98: liþ him on londe      þæs his lufu bædeð.
text.99: Wif sceal wiþ wer wære gehealdan,      oft hi mon wommum belihð;
text.101: freoð hy fremde monnan,      þonne se oþer feor gewiteþ.
text.102: Lida biþ longe on siþe;      a mon sceal seþeah leofes wenan,
text.103: gebidan þæs he gebædan ne mæg.      Hwonne him eft gebyre weorðe,
text.104: ham cymeð, gif he hal leofað,      nefne him holm gestyreð,
text.108: wuda ond wætres nyttað,      þonne him biþ wic alyfed,
text.109: mete bygeþ, gif he maran þearf,      ærþon he to meþe weorþe.
text.110: Seoc se biþ þe to seldan ieteð;      þeah hine mon on sunnan læde,
text.111: ne mæg he be þy wedre wesan,      þeah hit sy wearm on sumera,
text.112: ofercumen biþ he, ær he acwele,      gif he nat hwa hine cwicne fede.
text.113: Mægen mon sceal mid mete fedan,      morþor under eorþan befeolan,
text.114: hinder under hrusan,      þe hit forhelan þenceð;
text.115: ne biþ þæt gedefe deaþ,      þonne hit gedyrned weorþeð.
text.119: God bið genge,      ond wiþ god lenge.
text.121: seo sceal in eagan,      snyttro in breostum,
text.123: Muþa gehwylc mete þearf,      mæl sceolon tidum gongan.
text.132: rume roderas;      þæt is rice god,
text.134: se us eal forgeaf      þæt we on lifgaþ,
text.135: ond eft æt þam ende      eallum wealdeð
text.136: monna cynne.      þæt is meotud sylfa.
text.137: Ræd sceal mon secgan,      rune writan,
text.140: Til mon tiles      ond tomes meares,
text.143: Wel mon sceal wine healdan      on wega gehwylcum;
text.144: oft mon fereð feor bi tune,      þær him wat freond unwiotodne.
text.145: Wineleas, wonsælig mon      genimeð him wulfas to geferan,
text.146: felafæcne deor.      Ful oft hine se gefera sliteð;
text.147: gryre sceal for greggum,      græf deadum men;
text.148: hungre heofeð,      nales þæt heafe bewindeð,
text.149: ne huru wæl wepeð      wulf se græga,
text.150: morþorcwealm mæcga,      ac hit a mare wille.
text.151: Wræd sceal wunden,      wracu heardum men.
text.152: Boga sceal stræle,      sceal bam gelic
text.153: mon to gemæccan.      Maþþum oþres weorð,
text.154: gold mon sceal gifan.      Mæg god syllan
text.158: Treo sceolon brædan      ond treow weaxan,
text.163: Fela sceop meotud þæs þe fyrn gewearð,      het siþþan swa forð wesan.
text.166: Swa monige beoþ men ofer eorþan,      swa beoþ modgeþoncas;
text.168: Longað þonne þy læs      þe him con leoþa worn,
text.169: oþþe mid hondum con      hearpan gretan;
text.170: hafaþ him his gliwes giefe,      þe him god sealde.
text.171: Earm biþ se þe sceal ana lifgan,
text.172: wineleas wunian      hafaþ him wyrd geteod;
text.173: betre him wære þæt he broþor ahte,      begen hi anes monnes,
text.174: eorles eaforan wæran,      gif hi sceoldan eofor onginnan
text.175: oþþe begen beran;      biþ þæt sliþhende deor.
text.176: A scyle þa rincas      gerædan lædan
text.180: Hy twegen sceolon tæfle ymbsittan,      þenden him hyra torn toglide,
text.181: forgietan þara geocran gesceafta,      habban him gomen on borde;
text.182: idle hond æmetlan geneah tæfles monnes,      þonne teoselum weorpeð.
text.183: Seldan in sidum ceole,      nefne he under segle yrne,
text.184: werig scealc wiþ winde roweþ;      ful oft mon wearnum tihð
text.185: eargne, þæt he elne forleose,      drugað his ar on borde.
text.186: Lot sceal mid lyswe,      list mid gedefum;
text.191: Wearð fæhþo fyra cynne,      siþþan furþum swealg
text.192: eorðe Abeles blode.      Næs þæt andæge nið,
text.196: Cain, þone cwealm nerede;      cuþ wæs wide siþþan,
text.197: þæt ece nið ældum scod,      swa aþolwarum.
text.198: Drugon wæpna gewin      wide geond eorþan,
text.200: Gearo sceal guðbord,      gar on sceafte,
text.201: ecg on sweorde      ond ord spere,
text.202: hyge heardum men.      Helm sceal cenum,
text.203: ond a þæs heanan hyge      hord unginnost.
